job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Are you a Lead-level Software Engineer looking for a <strong>hands-on</strong> role with a growing company? Are you currently working with <strong>Java on the back-end</strong> and <strong>modern JavaScript for UI </strong>Development? Would you like to work with the most cutting-edge technologies for up to <strong>$170K Salary, a 10% bonus and UNLIMITED PTO per year</strong>? </p><p>Then keep reading! </p><p>Our client is a unique and innovative organization who have a fantastic opportunity for a Lead Software Engineer to join their expanding team. You will be empowered to use your creativity and flair to make a real difference from your first day. </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>What you’ll need? </strong></p><ul><li>FULL STACK capability – both front and back-end experience</li><li>Must be hands on with Java8</li><li>Worked with JavaScript in the last year</li><li>Experience with React and or Angular</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>What you’ll get in return: </strong></p><ul><li>Up to $170K Salary</li><li>10% annual bonus – for all your hard work</li><li>401K plan</li><li>Private healthcare plan</li><li>Company stock options available</li><li>Unlimited remote working</li><li>UNLIMITED PTO per year</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>What to do next? </strong></p><p>Apply directly via the link below or send me a message on LinkedIn! &nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p>
